Room3: ^If you can't find something to throw INTO an enemy, why not trying throwing the enemy itself?
^Try <color=#00d8ff>flicking</color> this next enemy into the labeled <color=#ff3600>hazard.</color>
^Remember: Unlike crates and barrels, enemies don't take kindly to being grabbed, and will <color=#ff3600>wriggle free</color> shortly after being grabbed.
